The prehistoric time is before we had written history. We do not have written records from that time. It is a time of early people, animals, and plants. These early people hunted animals, gathered food, and made tools. They built homes and communities. We can learn about this time by studying the things they left behind, like fossils, tools, and artifacts. These things help us know what life was like a long time ago. People have been interested in prehistory for a long time and have learned a lot about it. We can learn even more as we continue to study this time.
